In England, in the seven days to 19 January, there were 557,007 new confirmed cases (985.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 January, there were 641,695 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 13% (84,688 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 January is 13,558,510 (23,976.1 cases per 100,000 population).
